patthana21.50:4.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.50:5.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.50:5.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.50:6.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.50:7.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.50:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
